name: Military Commando Strike
description:
You can enjoy this thrilling combat commando shooting game with modern combat battlefield.In this Military Commando Strike you can use latest gun to make control smooth and easy for use. In this Military Commando Strike game you have to survive and complete all thrilling missions as an army secret commando, use your commando sniper skills to survive in war battle zone. In this commando shooting game your mission is to kill all the enemies with advance weapons and also with in limited time.Military Commando Strike game is real 3D commando action game.

Military Commando Strike: Features

Smooth Intuitive Controls
Cool 3D graphics
Exciting Missions
Addictive Gameplay
Different modern weapons
